data.title: Official Jury Archives
data.meta_description: Our official jury has gathered to award 6 prizes to French and Quebec films in competition. Directing, acting, original music, documentary, screenplay… The members of the Jury 2024, once again gathered around our President for life, will have to look at the films from all their angles. All the more reason to bring together different areas of knowledge and experience. The awards ceremony will take place in the Salon des Gouverneurs of the Casino Barrière (Cinéma) on Thursday September 12 at 6:00 pm.
data.text:
Official Jury

Our official jury has gathered to award 6 prizes to French and Quebec films in competition. Directing, acting, original music, documentary, screenplay… The members of the Jury 2024, once again gathered around our President for life, will have to look at the films from all their angles. All the more reason to bring together different areas of knowledge and experience.

The awards ceremony will take place in the Salon des Gouverneurs of the Casino Barrière (Cinéma) on Thursday September 12 at 6:00 pm.
